row.col: How should I use Money Lover app for credit card management?

Currently the app has yet to support automatic credit card management and the multiple wallets' report is still under development.
We would recommend you to use Transfer feature to transfer the income to one wallet (for instance, Cash wallet) and record the actual expenditure in such wallet. For example, if you pay by credit card for $50 for Shopping, you can transfer such amount from Credit Card wallet to Cash wallet, and record a spending of $50 for Shopping in Cash wallet. (Don't worry, you can exclude that transaction in both wallets' income or expense report).
That way you can control the balance of your wallets and also see the total report on your spending. The Net Loss in Credit Card wallet is how much you owe the bank. When you have actually paid for it, you can transfer the money back to Credit Card or add income transaction to Credit Card wallet.
This is just temporary solution for the drawback. Hope that it could be some suggestion for you to track your expense.

You can use "Recurring Transactions" function (under "Tools" section for Android version) in Navigation panel.
Please be aware that the concept for recurring transaction is kinda similar to an automatic method to add repetitive transactions. You'll only see the transactions in your wallet when it reaches the time you have anticipated in the setting of recurring transactions. Therefore, be patient when you add recurring transaction and have not seen it in the transaction list.
Try setting the nearest time (about next 3-5 minutes) to see how the function works.
To change the repeating mode, tap the "Repeat Daily" to see other options or anticipate the number of days that such transaction will repeat in the future in line "Every 1 day".
Hi, thanks for feedback. Please tap the three dot icon on the top right of cashbook's screen. You can select "Transfer Money" feature.
How to set up or stop daily reminders?

Go to the navigation menu, then swipe down to choose "Settings" option.
Choose to turn on or off with the "Daily Alarm" option in iOS version or "Daily remind of adding transaction" in Android and Windows Phone version to change the setting from there.
What's budget? How to use budget?

Budget : a targeted limit for one specific wallet’s all categories or one specific category.
1. Open left Menu.
2. Select Budget
3. Tap (+) to create a budget.
4. Set budget for all expenses or for each category.
5. Save ( finish).
Option: check Repeat budget to automatically add in the next time.

Saving: a targeted plan to save money for one specific wallet.
How to create a saving plan?
1. Open the left Menu, tap Saving.
2. Tap to plus button (+) to add new saving.
3. Set: Name, Goal, Initial amount, Ending date (if need).
4. Tap Save (on the top right ) to finish.
How to use Saving?
-Deposit: when you save amount of money
-Withdraw: when you spend the money from your savings.
When reaching the goals, tap to spend if you use this saving money. It will be recorded as a transaction.

Your data is absolutely safe!
Your data is always safe with us. We’ll never give your information to anyone. Using SSL encryption on both Free and Premium account. We can guarantee that.
In addition, we are using Google Cloud services - the biggest hosting service - which is trusted by thousands of companies and banks.
How to purchase Money Lover Premium?

For International users
We use In-App Billing methods offered by Google Play Store and Apple App Store. When you buy an item, you will be redirected to the corresponding store and pay by your registered credit card.
If you prefer not to attach your credit card information to such systems, you can pay us via Paypal by sending the equivalent amount to account "contact@moneylover.me" and then shoot us over such email to confirm. We will activate the Premium status for your account from our system.
Làm thế nào để thanh toán phiên bản Premium đầy đủ chức năng?

Money Lover có thể hỗ trợ người dùng Việt Nam và có tài khoản ngân hàng như sau:
- Người dùng chuyển khoản số tiền 100.000 VNĐ và gửi xác nhận qua email (contact@moneylover.me).
Thông tin tài khoản người nhận:
Ngân hàng: Vietcombank
Số tài khoản: 0021000256315
Chủ tài khoản: Ngô Xuân Huy
Chi nhánh: Nguyễn Du, Hà Nội
- Sau khi nhận được email xác nhận và thông báo chuyển khoản từ ngân hàng, chúng tôi sẽ kích hoạt cho tài khoản gắn với email của bạn.
Tài khoản của bạn sẽ được ghi nhớ theo email và có thể sử dụng trọn đời. Nếu như còn gặp khó khăn gì trong việc thanh toán và sử dụng ứng dụng, bạn có thể liên lạc với chúng qua tính năng "Hỗ trợ" được tích hợp trong app.
What are the difference among different versions?

Free version: We offer Money Lover freely with limited feature: - User can only create two (2) Wallets, one (1) Budget, one (1) Saving campaign, and one (1) Event. All finished budgets, savings or events are also counted. - User can backup and restore database, but can not export database to CSV and Excel file. - Advertisement display. Basic functions without ads display: - User can use the app's basic functions similar to the Free version, but without those annoying ads. Premium: - User can use all features in the app, without any restriction. And of course, no ads!
How long will my Money Lover Premium last?

Your purchase will be valid for lifetime. Should there be any change in our business model, you can stay assured that your purchase will still worth the value you have received.
Should there be anything wrong with your Premium account, you can contact us via in-app Help & Support function to get our assistance.
Provide us with your purchasing method in advance so that we can give you proper instructions to retrieve your Premium account.
How to purchase Money Lover Premium without a credit card?

If you don't have a credit card, you can pay us via Paypal by sending the equivalent amount to account "contact@moneylover.me" and then shoot us over such email to confirm. We will activate the Premium status for your account from our system.

You can pay via PayPal by sending $4.99 or equivalent to contact@moneylover.me
Then inform us via email contact@moneylover.me. Please also provide your email of your Money Lover account.
Thank you & happy saving!
What is Money Lover? What can I use it for?

If you love to actively control what’s happening in your life and have total power over it, Money Lover is one of the best tools that can bring you such power. Money Lover provides you with the two solutions for your personal finance: smarter spending habit and better saving/investment for your future. It’s a powerful tool to track your personal finance: incomes, expenses, debts, and savings.
1. Record and categorize expenses/ incomes
2. Create budgets and keep track saving plans.
3. Keep track your debt/ loan.
4. Bill reminders & schedule for recurring transactions..
5. Travel mode for tourists.
Can I use Money Lover in other devices?

Yes, in case you registered Money Lover account. You only need to login in other devices to continue use Money Lover.
We support Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Windows 8.1, 10; MacOS and Web-based.
Cloud service makes Money Lover work seamlessly across all devices.
Android : phone and tablet.
iOS : iPhone, iPad and iPod
Windows : Windows 8.1, Windows 10 and Windows phone.
Mac OS : testing
Web version : web.moneylover.me
Can I import CSV or excel files to Money Lover?

Sorry, you can not do it.
Only .mlx file, which was generated by our Backup tools can be imported to Money Lover.
Please notice that you can export transactions to excel or csv files but these files are not for Backup & Restore .
Can I use Premium version across devices?
Sure, you only have to purchase one time. Premium features work seamlessly across devices and platforms.
Create one category, available on all wallet ?
Thank you for feedback. Each wallet is separate for now. We're working diligently to improve the total categories for all wallet and hope to release in the near future.
I want to view report total wallet
Please go to list of wallet in menu. Tap "TOTAL" to see total report of all wallets.
Thank you for feedback. Each wallet is separate for now. We are working to improve this feature.
Now each wallet is separate. We have a plan to improve this function in the future
How can I transfer data from old phone?
You can create a backup ( .mlx file), copy to the new phone and restore from this file. Please go Settings --> Backup & Restore.
I can't sync my recurring transaction and bill
Bills and recurring transactions are not actual transactions like the future transactions. You can see them on other devices after due date or bill was paid.

Hi, thank you for feedback. Could you please help us to translate to your language? If you agree, we will send an invitation email to you :)
We invite you to explore and help us translate MoneyLover at Crowdin.
The registration is free and fast. You'll be translating in no time.
How to delete or edit wallet on Android devices ?

Thank you for feedback. Please tap three dots icon on top right of main screen to see "edit wallet" function. You can delete or edit that wallet with this function.
P.S: You can not recover deleted wallet. Please consider carefully. You can see more detail on our blog:
[Read blog](http://note.moneylover.me/wallet-manager/)
Hope this helps. Let me know if you need further support. Thank you :)
How to add an income transaction ?
Hi, please choose the "income" tab next to the "expense" tab when you select category for that transaction.
Đổi email tài khoản Money Lover

Khi bạn cần đổi email tài khoản Money Lover, hãy làm theo hướng dẫn sau:
B1: Gửi yêu cầu và địa chỉ email mới cần đổi qua mail: contact@moneylover.me (Lưu ý email mới chưa từng đăng ký tài khoản Money Lover).
B2: Thoát tài khoản cũ khỏi tất cả các thiết bị bạn đã đăng nhập. (Lưu ý trước khi thoát nên tạo file backup dữ liệu).
B3: Trước khi thoát khỏi thiết bị cuối cùng, báo lại bên mình qua mail trên. Sau 1-2 tiếng bạn có thể đăng nhập lại Money Lover bằng email mới.
Money Lover Team
Trân trọng!
How to change my email account ?

Should you need to change the email associated to your Money Lover account, please follow these steps:
Step 1: Tell us your new email address, one that hasn’t been registered with Money Lover before.
Step 2: Backup your data if needed, then log out on all of your current device.
Step 3: Inform us once you have done so, by sending an email to: contact@moneylover.me. After 12 hours, you will be able to log in using your new email.
Money Lover Team.
